F   I   D   G   E   T     S   P   I   N   N   E   R     M   U   S   I   C     B   O   X  

10/02/2017

Starting from the project that was mentioned here - I transformed the silly spinner into a music box by attaching an additional speaker to the Arduino powering the LEDs. When you spin it, it plays ‘Pop Goes The Weasel’.
